description: This table contains the lab follow-up task event history that audits the events and actions that were taken on follow-up tasks.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LAB_EVENTHX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The event history type category number for the follow-up task history event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Task Created


Completed


Re-opened


Due Date/Time Updated


Start Date/Time Updated


Changed Assigned User


Converted


Printed Label/Document


Actions Triggered


Action: Complete Task


Action: Print Letter


Action: Use Extension


Changed Laboratory


Note


Comments Edited

columns.name: LAB_EVENTHX_DT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the event occurred.

columns.name: LAB_EVENTHX_USR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user who is associated with this event.

columns.name: LAB_EVENTHX_CMT
columns.description: The comments associated with this event.

columns.name: LAB_EVENTHX_ORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the order record that is associated with this event.
